response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product holds immense value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication by our team. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe its true worth lies well above its market value, making it a remarkable investment for any discerning individual like yourself.

Considering the significant importance this product holds for both parties involved, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the chance to secure this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $950,000. This represents an outstanding saving of $50,000 compared to its regular market value, making it an unprecedented opportunity not to be missed.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We are confident that once you experience the unparalleled benefits and features of this product, you will agree that this is an exceptional value proposition. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out to me directly.

Thank you for considering this extraordinary opportunity. We look forward to the possibility of welcoming you as a valued member of our exclusive clientele.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
